Room.Name: Bottom of the Stairs
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the bottom of the stairs in the Boar's Arse Pub.
Room.LongDescription: As you approach, a couple of bouncers stand and stare at you. If you want to go up these stairs, you had better have the right answers to their questions. Give the wrong answer, or make the wrong move, and you will probably have to fight your way out of here.
